movies.title: Raised by Wolves
movies.plot: When a group of friends come across an abandoned house in the barren desert, what follows is a terrifying tale of evil possession causing the friends to slowly turn against each other.
movies.simplePlot: When a group of friends come across an abandoned house in the barren desert, what follows is a terrifying tale of evil possession causing the friends to slowly turn against each other.

biography.bio: Known for playing Cole on MTV's "Awkward", Monty began acting at a young age. After years of performing at UCB and graduating NYU early, Monty moved to LA. His production company Final Boss Films has millions of views online, and has sold pilots to MSN. He has also placed in national stand up, improv, and sketch competitions; and has written for shows such as "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon", "Comedy Central Roast", and "College Humor".
biography.name: Monty Geer

biography.bio: Evan Crooks is an actor, known for The Great Halloween Puppy Adventure (2012), Raised by Wolves (2014) and Awkward. (2011).
biography.name: Evan Crooks

biography.bio: Leore Hayon was born in Los Angeles, California. She is an only child to her Moroccan father (from Israel) and her Italian and Swedish mother (from Rolling Hills, CA). She grew up as a competitive figure skater in North Hollywood, CA. After graduating from California State University Northridge with a degree in Journalism (emphasis in public relations), she started modeling full time, appearing in campaigns and magazine editorials. During this time she decided to pursue acting. Her first acting role was in a short film called Eden. A year later she went on to play the same role in the feature length film Eden.
biography.name: Leore Hayon

biography.bio: Hassan Mahmoud is an actor, known for The Objective (2015), Raised by Wolves (2014) and The 40th Day (2013).
biography.name: Hassan Mahmoud

biography.bio: Michael Hudson is an actor, known for Raised by Wolves (2014), 1313: Billy the Kid (2012) and 1313: Boy Crazies (2011).
biography.name: Michael Hudson

biography.bio: Kristina Emerson is an actress and writer, known for NCIS: New Orleans (2014), Finding Carter (2014) and One Last Thing (2017).
biography.name: Kristina Emerson

biography.bio: Alisa Torres is an actress, known for Raised by Wolves (2014), Strings (2012) and Criminal Minds (2005).
biography.name: Alisa Torres

biography.bio: Steven Flores is known for his work on Dogs & Me (2012), Raised by Wolves (2014) and Connected (2012).
biography.name: Steven Flores

biography.bio: Rocky Abou-Sakher is known for his work on The Magnificent Seven (2016), Logan (2017) and Free State of Jones (2016).
biography.name: Rocky Abou-Sakher

biography.bio: Porn star Jenna Haze was born and raised in conservative Orange County, California. Her parents divorced when she was young. At 15 she had to drop out of high school to help support the family, and worked at a succession of low-paying jobs. When she turned 18 she tried stripping for a living, but didn't like it and quit after only one day. A year later she met someone at a club who had connections to the adult-film industry and told her she would be perfect for that business. Intrigued, she decided to try it, and two days later was shooting her first porn scene at a studio in the San Fernando Valley. At first she used an agent to secure work, but soon realized that she could do better on her own and dropped him. She worked almost nonstop until she took a "breather" during the Christmas season of 2001 and didn't make any films for several months. When she came back in early 2002 she was hired by Jill Kelly Productions for one film, and they were so impressed with her that they offered her a contract, which she eventually accepted.
biography.name: Jenna Haze

biography.bio: Asia LeMasters spent the first few years of her career as a script supervisor, and since moving to Los Angeles in 2013, has ventured into Production Managing, Assistant directing, and Producing. She is an experienced director and has been writing screenplays, fiction, and poetry since she was a teenager. Her passion for the film industry has allowed her to understand the intricacies of multiple aspects of creating a film.
biography.name: Asia LeMasters

biography.bio: Keith Roenke grew up in New Hampshire, studied theater in England, and moved to Los Angeles for his first band. He performed as drummer and later as lead singer and guitar player. Keith decided to take a break from touring to pursue his other passion: acting. Since, he has been successful with roles as the lead in D'agostino, Lying for a Living, and numerous independent films. He also has writer and producer credits.
biography.name: Keith Roenke

biography.bio: Lane Thomas was born as Lane Thomas Aikin. He is an actor and writer, known for Choose (2013), Connect (2012) and The Last Room.
biography.name: Lane Thomas
